title: Update schema for ImplicitUsings feature
body:
As per dotnet/sdk#19521, update schema info in [src/MSBuild/MSBuild/Microsoft.Build.CommonTypes.xsd](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/src/MSBuild/MSBuild/Microsoft.Build.CommonTypes.xsd) for property and item type introduced in .NET 6 for the implicit usings feature:

- [x] `<ImplicitUsings>` property, equal to `True`, `true`, or `enable`
- [x] `<Using Include="" Alias="" Static="true" />` item type where:
  - Definition value is the namespace or type identifier to add, e.g. `Microsoft.AspNetCore`
  - `Alias` attribute is the alias identifier to use to identify the type being aliased
  - `Static` is a boolean indicating whether the identifier should be registered as a static import
